thread.title: Copper Is Sending a Bearish Signal

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Copper Is Sending a Bearish Signal
text:
Copper is missing out on this year’s commodities rally, a sign that investors remain cautious about the health of the global economy despite the stock market’s recent recovery. Prices of the metal used to build everything from airplanes to smartphones have fallen 6.2% in 2018 after hitting a nearly four-year high late last year. Returns […]
